Class JUnitModel

java.lang.Object

public final class JUnitModel
extends java.lang.Object

Central registry for JUnit test runs.

getTestRunSessions

public java.util.List getTestRunSessions()
Returns:
a list of active TestRunSessions. The list is a copy of the internal data structure and modifications do not affect the global list of active sessions. The list is sorted by age, youngest first.

addTestRunSession

public void addTestRunSession(TestRunSession testRunSession)
Adds the given TestRunSession and notifies all registered ITestRunSessionListeners.

To be called in the UI thread only!

Parameters:
testRunSession - the session to add

importTestRunSession

public static TestRunSession importTestRunSession(java.io.File file)
                                           throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Imports a test run session from the given file.

Parameters:
file - a file containing a test run session transcript
Returns:
the imported test run session
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if the import failed
